ProductInfo.Features:
EASY TO USE - Full Color HD Camera Pen & Video with Audio - Rechargeable Li-Ion battery records up to 1 hour on a single charge
Still Image Camera is 4032 X 3024  pixels (format JPG) - Video HD Resolution of 1280 X 720p
4GB Storage Expandable to 32GB - Microphone records audio clearly in the range of 15 feet -
Suitable for any computer with standard 2.0 USB port - Includes USB adaptor power cord and 110v wall outlet charger, Key Fob Cap and Software
Measures 5.75" x .5" (Handle) Weighs 1.7 oz - One (1) Year Limited Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: Spy Camera Pen Professional (DVR) Hidden HD Video Camera with Audio 4GB to 32GB Storage 1280 X 720p Resolution
